string.text: Base chance without bonuses and penalties. Used in the calculation of the final chance to intimidate.
You have to be this close to your target to intimidate them.
Increases chances of converting npc to your faction because you persuaded them to surrender instead of giving them a deadly injury.
Attack chance if failed to convert

Overrides the attack chance from the "Convert npcs to your faction" addon. Added because enemies, that never got badly wounded, should have more strength to fight back. Only overrides chance of those enemies who surrendered after intimidation.
Chance to surrender is increased by this value if the enemy has less than 50% health.
Chance to surrender is increased by this value if the enemy can't see you.
The voice lines that are being played whenever you attempt to intimidate an enemy.
How many milliseconds it takes before the target reacts to you. Without delay npc surrenders before hearing you, which looks stupid

Isolation mechanic lowers or increases chances depending on how isolated the target is from their friends. Without it you can make a person surrender to you even while they are among hundreds of their friends.
Stalkers outside this range don't affect intimidation chance.
This value is added per each additional enemy of your target near them. So if you surround an enemy with your squad, you have a bigger chance to scare them.
This value is subtracted per each additional friend of your target near them. So you are less likely to intimidate someone who's around their friends.

When turned on, enemies will play voice lines whenever they agree or refuse to surrender. I couldn't find a way to make them play directly from the npcs, so it's imperfect, plays together with the npc's other voice lines, and can't properly copy their voice.(Each faction only has 1 response voice, because i couldn't find a way to detect individual npc's voices.) Also it's stationary, so if the npc runs away, the sound will just play from the last place they were in.

Formula for calculating final intimidation chance:\n[base chance] + [sneak bonus](if enemy can't see you) + [low health bonus](if enemy has less than 50% hp) + [isolation bonus](per each stalker that is close and hostile to the enemy) - [isolation penalty](per each friend of the enemy that is close to them) - [enemy's rank bravery] = [final chance to intimidate]%
